Properties.ProtectedString:
ball = script.Parent damage = 10
HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.Name = "HitSound" HitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=34376514" HitSound.Parent = ball HitSound.Volume = 1
hitPerson = false
function onTouched(hit) if hitPerson then return end if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid")
if humanoid ~= nil then hitPerson = true humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) HitSound:Play()
myPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(humanoid.Parent) if myPlayer == nil then ball.Parent = nil return end cScreen = myPlayer.PlayerGui:FindFirstChild("CakeScreen") if (cScreen == nil) then -- need to make a new cScreen cScreen = script:FindFirstChild("CakeScreen") if cScreen == nil then print("CSCREEN NOT CLONEABLE!") end cScreen:Clone().Parent = myPlayer.PlayerGui end
cScript = script:FindFirstChild("CakeScript") if (cScript == nil) then print("CSCRIPT NOT CLONEABLE!") end newCScript = cScript:Clone() newCScript.Parent = myPlayer.PlayerGui newCScript.Disabled = false end
ball.Parent = nil
-- HitSound:Play() -- ball.Parent = nil --print("Hit Ground At: ") --print(ball.Position) --[[if not hitPerson then ball.Parent = nil elseif humanoid ~= nil then ball.BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0,ball:GetMass()*196.1643,0) ball.Velocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0) ball.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0) --[[bodyPart = nil switch = math.random(1,6) if switch == 1 then ball.Position = humanoid.Parent.Head.Position end if switch == 2 then ball.Position = humanoid.Parent.Torso.Position end if switch == 3 then bodyPart = humanoid.Parent:findFirstChild("Left Arm") end if switch == 4 then bodyPart = humanoid.Parent:findFirstChild("Right Arm") end if switch == 5 then bodyPart = humanoid.Parent:findFirstChild("Left Leg") end if switch == 6 then bodyPart = humanoid.Parent:findFirstChild("Right Leg") end if bodyPart ~= nil then ball.Position = bodyPart.Position end print(switch) --ball.Position = hit.Position+Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*2, (math.random()-.5)*2, (math.random()-.5)*2) --print(hit) ]]--]] --ball.Position = humanoid.Parent.Head.Position+Vector3.new(math.random()-.5, math.random()-.5, math.random()-.5) --end end
connection = ball.Touched:connect(onTouched)
function isNotCreator(target) name_tag = ball:findFirstChild("creator") if name_tag == nil then return false end
--print(target) --print(name_tag.Value)
if (target == name_tag.Value) then return false else return true end end
for i = 1,50 do if not hitPerson then myPlayers = game.Players:GetPlayers()
local bestTarget = nil local bestDistance = 1000
-- search for closest potential target for j = 1, #myPlayers do if myPlayers[j] ~= nil then if isNotCreator(myPlayers[j]) then newDistance = myPlayers[j]:DistanceFromCharacter(ball.Position) if newDistance < bestDistance then bestDistance = newDistance bestTarget = myPlayers[j] end end end end
--if bestTarget ~= nil and ball.Velocity.Y < 0 then if bestTarget ~= nil then -- home in on this target --print("homing") dPos = bestTarget.Character.PrimaryPart.Position - ball.Position --ball.BodyForce.force = dPos*.01 --ball.Velocity = Vector3.new(dPos.unit.X*15, 0, dPos.unit.Z*15)
-- 2D-angle-back-solving-code -- A is deltaY, B is (.5*g*deltaX^2)/v^2, and C is deltaX -- then our quadratic to be solved is (A^2+C^2)*x^2 + (2AB-C^2)*x + B^2 -- where x is cos(theta)*cos(theta)
-- we solve for the optimal angle to be traveling at this speed (given gravity), and then adjust the velocities -- to go closer to this optimal angle-based velocity (using a weighted average)
deltaX = math.sqrt(dPos.X*dPos.X+dPos.Z*dPos.Z) vSq = ball.Velocity:Dot(ball.Velocity) A = dPos.Y B = .5*196.1643*deltaX*deltaX/vSq C = deltaX
qA = A*A+C*C qB = 2*A*B - C*C qC = B*B
det = qB*qB - 4*qA*qC if qA ~= 0 and det >= 0 then xSquaredPlus = (-qB + math.sqrt(det))/(2*qA) --xSquaredMinus = (-qB - math.sqrt(det)/(2*qA)
if xSquaredPlus > 0 then newCosX = math.sqrt(xSquaredPlus) --newAlpha = math.acos(newX) newSinX = (1 - newCosX*newCosX) if newSinX >= 0 then v = math.sqrt(vSq) newSinX = math.sqrt(newSinX)
if (dPos.Y + B/(newCosX*newCosX)) < 0 then newSinX = -newSinX end
vXZ = v * newCosX vY = v * newSinX vX = vXZ * dPos.X / deltaX vZ = vXZ * dPos.Z / deltaX --ball.Velocity = Vector3.new(vX, vY, vZ) ball.Velocity = Vector3.new(ball.Velocity.X*.7+vX*.3, ball.Velocity.Y*.7+vY*.3, ball.Velocity.Z*.7+vZ*.3) end end end end wait(.05) end end --ball.SparkSound.Looped = false --ball.SparkSound:Stop() if hitPerson then wait(5) end ball.Parent = nil

print("You got caked!")
splats = script:FindFirstChild("Splats") if splats == nil then splats = Instance.new("Sound") splats.Parent = script splats.Volume = 1 splats.Name = "Splats" splats.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=34376514" end
screen = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("CakeScreen") if screen == nil then print("Could not find screen in PlayerGUI") end
cake = screen:FindFirstChild("cake") if cake == nil then print("The Cake Was a Lie! (cake picture could not be found under CakeScreen)") end
newCake = cake:Clone() newCake.Position = UDim2.new(math.random(), -10, math.random()*.8, -10) --newCake.Position = UDim2.new(math.random()*.70+.25, 0, math.random()*.70+.25, 0) newCake.Size = UDim2.new(.2, 10, .2, 10) newCake.Visible = true newCake.Parent = screen
for i = 1,100 do newCake.Size = UDim2.new(.2, 10, .2+i*.008, 10) wait(.1) end
--print("Finished cake script!!") --script.Disabled = true --script.Parent = nil

local Tool = script.Parent;
Tool.Enabled = true
function fire(dPos)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
--This call will cause a "wait" until the data comes back local root = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(34384720)
local instances = root:GetChildren() if #instances == 0 then root:Remove() return end
root = root:FindFirstChild("Cupcake") if root == nil then return end
local missile = root:Clone() missile.RotVelocity = Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*20, (math.random()-.5)*20, (math.random()-.5)*20)
if vCharacter.Name == "Backpack" then return end local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
spawnPos = spawnPos + dPos.unit*5 dPos = dPos - dPos.unit * 5
-- convert to a 2D space deltaXZSquared = dPos.X*dPos.X + dPos.Z*dPos.Z deltaXZ = math.sqrt(deltaXZSquared) deltaY = dPos.Y
--[[print("dPos: ") print(dPos)
print("deltaY: ") print(deltaY)
print("deltaXZ: ") print(deltaXZ)]]--
-- pick a random medium angle (45 +- 45/2 degrees) alpha = math.random()*math.pi/4 + math.pi/8 --alpha = math.pi / 4
missile.Position = spawnPos missile.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
-- back-solve for the velocity required to hit the target point --gravity = 196.1643 gravity = 196.1643 numerator = -0.5*gravity*deltaXZSquared denominator = math.cos(alpha)*math.cos(alpha)*(deltaY - math.tan(alpha)*deltaXZ)
--[[print("numerator: ") print(numerator) print("denominator: ") print(denominator)]]--
if denominator == 0 then return end missileSpeed = math.sqrt(numerator / denominator) if missileSpeed > 200 then missileSpeed = 200 end vXZ = missileSpeed * math.cos(alpha) vY = missileSpeed * math.sin(alpha) vX = vXZ * dPos.X / deltaXZ vZ = vXZ * dPos.Z / deltaXZ missile.Velocity = Vector3.new(vX, vY, vZ) --[[print("missileSpeed: ") print(missileSpeed) print("vY: ") print(vY) print("vX: ") print(vX) print("vZ: ") print(vZ)]]--
missile.BrickColor = BrickColor.Random() missile.Shape = 0
-- missile.BottomSurface = 0 -- missile.TopSurface = 0 missile.Name = "Spark" missile.Reflectance = .5 missile.Transparency = 0 missile.CanCollide = false
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0,0,0) --force.force = Vector3.new(0,98,0) --force.force = Vector3.new(0, missile:getMass()*200,0) force.Parent = missile
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = missile
local new_script = script.Parent.LaserBlast:clone() new_script.Disabled = false new_script.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
local cakeBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("CakeBang") if cakeBang ~= nil then cakeBang.Volume = 0.5 cakeBang:Play() end end
function gunUp() --Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,.196, -.981) --Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) --Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,.981, -.196)
for i = 1,15 do upAngle = math.cos(i*math.pi/60) downAngle = math.sin(i*math.pi/60) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, downAngle, -upAngle) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, upAngle, -downAngle) wait(.02) end end
function gunOut()
for i = 1,15 do upAngle = math.cos((15-i)*math.pi/60) downAngle = math.sin((15-i)*math.pi/60) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, downAngle, -upAngle) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, upAngle, -downAngle) wait(.02) end
--Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,0,-1) --Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) --Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,1,0) end
function onEquip() Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0, -1) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, -.8, .8) end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position).unit
local reload = 1.5
gunUp() for i = 1,5 do local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint --local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position) local lookAt = targetPos - character.PrimaryPart.Position --if (lookAt.magnitude > 1000) then lookAt = lookAt.unit * 1000 end fire(lookAt) wait(.6) end wait(reload) gunOut() wait(reload)
cakeBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("CakeBang") if cakeBang ~= nil then cakeBang.Volume = 0 end
Tool.Enabled = true end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquip)

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end print("ending") enabled = false
while Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
enabled = true end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)
